content: Today I have pre-applied GF#19415 - adding documentation about MDC codes developed in collaboration with DEV. (thanks @Brian Reinhold, @John Rhoads ) It is published at http://build.fhir.org/mdc.html (or will be, in about an hour). Can vocab please review and approve this for R4 publication sometime in the next 2 weeks. Thanks @Rob Hausam @Ted Klein

When will this be moved to terminology.hl7.org? (i.e. when will the canonical URI be updated out of the build environment). I assume it will happen soon after we get the publisher to generate the stuff at terminology.hl7.org...???
no this isn't something that will be maintained through UTG.
That looks quite good to me. I don't think I have any suggestions at the moment - ee'll let the real devices folks weigh in.
